Effect: Place this card face up in your play area ACTION: You may spend 6 resources and purge this card to research 1 technology.
Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

Place the ion storm token in this system with either side face up. Then, place this card in the common play area. At the end of a "Move Ships" or "Retreat" sub-step of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.
You may replenish your commodities, or you may convert your commodities to trade goods.
Place the Mirage planet token in this system. Gain the Mirage planet card and ready it. Then, purge this card.
This card counts as a relic fragment of any type.
Gain 1 command token and 2 trade goods.
Gain 1 command token and 3 trade goods.
Gain 1 command token and 1 trade good.
